title: Manage a Co-Brokerage Agreement
description: Two brokers from different firms are working together on a large transaction and need to formalize their commission split.

tasks.description: Draft a co-brokerage agreement that clearly defines each broker's roles, responsibilities, and the agreed-upon commission split.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and comprehensive agreement is drafted.

tasks.description: Send the agreement to the other broker for review and signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agreement is sent for execution.

tasks.description: Once the transaction closes, ensure the title company is aware of the agreement and disburses the commission checks correctly to each brokerage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The commission is paid out correctly according to the agreement.
